solution.linktext: The Program is designed to promote and drive growth of select Microsoft Official Course titles to increase the number of individuals who are trained and earn a Microsoft Certification. It is also designed to help eligible MPN members with an active Learning Competency expand their businesses. To enroll in the new FY15H1 Partner Incentive Program go to https://mslearning.ms-rebates.com
How to get Microsoft Partner Network Help from the RSC

community.linktext: Get help from the Learning Competency Partner Forum

level.title: Submit a request online
level.description: Submit the details of your request online, and a Microsoft partner consultant will contact you with customized guidance to meet your business needs.
